lexUnit.name: genocide.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the deliberate killing of a very large number of people from a particular ethnic group or nation.

sentence.text: The term ` radiation genocide " is commonly used in Kiev and Minsk newspapers to refer to the accident .

Aleksandr Lebed ( appointed in June ) who had remarked on July 4 that the conflict between Moldova and the Dnestr republic was not ethnic but involved " genocide against one 's own people " , and had labelled oldova 's President as " fascist " .
